channel.title: free will on PostDoc Problems
channel.description: Recent content in free will on PostDoc Problems

item.title: Where do thoughts come from?
item.description: I had been thinking on and off about free will for some time now. To anyone who has some time to think, the pandemic is bound to raise some serious questions about control and free will. The following marathon conversation between Lex Fridman and Sam Harris rekindled my interest in the subject. Do humans have free will? At the most fundamental level, the answer has to be no as we are all bound by the laws of physics.
